name: Dark Harvest (itch) (Project Titan Games)
description: Dark Harvest is a multifaceted, side-scrolling video game, set in the wild west, that combines two gaming genres into one: platformers and role-playing games. This project features 2-dimensional levels, as well as inventory, dialogue, economic, narrative, fast travel, and combat systems. The game itself places the player in the shoes of a traveler, stuck in a science-fiction world, trying to get-rich-quick. After his plans and schemes fail, he sets out to find the gold mines. Along the way, he runs into an old man who has some ideas of his own.
